New Records: Quentin Grimes has averaged 15.6 points, 5.7 rebounds, and 4 assists in seven games since Luka Doncic's injury
Key Match Events: Grimes scored 23 points and nine rebounds in a win against the Lakers
Pre-Game Insights: Quentin Grimes mentioned the importance of stepping up with Doncic and Irving out
Portland has relied on a balanced attack with multiple scorers in double figures
Coach Chauncey Billups plans to use Robert Williams III more to relieve pressure on the frontcourt
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Mavericks and Trail Blazers have had four meetings this season, with the Mavericks winning twice before the Blazers' recent victory
